name: Bandage Master 2D
description:
In this follow-up to 1988's poorly-received Bandage Master 1D, you must purchase and arrange bandages with maximum efficiency to heal as many patients as possible. Purchase your bandage boxes wisely with limited time and limited money. Stack for extra points, avoid placing adhesive on wounds, and become the Bandage Master!

Controls:

WASD, arrows, or scroll wheel - Navigate menus

Enter - Select

Click on boxes to purchase them

Scroll wheel to navigate through bandages

Click and drag to move bandages that aren't covered by other bandages

Click the "next" button when you are ready for the next patient
